betterquesting:10.desc:8:
Bloody portals will randomly swipe out around the player, and you may encounter them in your quest... 
Once the Bloody Portal opens, the Blood Cultists and Blood Knights inside will swarm out, deal with them carefully and scan for them, then after that, you'll be able to kill them, defeating them will give you a chance to get the Bloody Treasure Tome, don't right-click to use it and use it to unlock the first step of the Evil Artistry research! 

 Tip: Bloody portals are often found in desert areas!
